article_title: Carson: 'I believe our country is on the precipice'
article_text:
Retired neurosurgeon Ben Carson speaks during an interview at the New Hampshire Union Leader on Monday. (DAVID LANE/UNION LEADER) Retired neurosurgeon Ben Carson speaks during an interview at the New Hampshire Union Leader on Monday. (DAVID LANE/UNION LEADER)

Carson: 'I believe our country is on the precipice'

article_metadata.description: Dr. Ben Carson, on his first foray into New Hampshire as a possible presidential hopeful, offered a candid take on everything from the dangers of radical Islam to the risk Republicans face if another progressive is elected to the White House.
article_metadata.title: Carson: 'I believe our country is on the precipice' | New Hampshire
